data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed the transcript of the earnings conference call for the quarter ended June 30, 2023, held on Monday, July 17, 2023.The audio recording and the transcript of the earnings conference call can be accessed on the Company''s website at: https://www.tataelxsi.com/investors.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended June 30, 2023.
data.news_body:
Please find enclosed the audited financial results of the Company for the quarter ended June 30, 2023. The Auditors'' Report with an unmodified opinion on the said financial results is also enclosed.

The meeting of the Board of Directors commenced at 02:00 p.m. and concluded at 03:42 p.m.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Schedule III of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015, we wish to inform you that the transcript of the above said Earnings Conference Call held on Thursday, May 18, 2023, has been uploaded on the website of the Company.Intimation in this regard is enclosed.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: Q4 FY23 Earnings Presentation and Fact Sheet

data.caption: Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended March 31, 2023.
data.news_body:
Please find enclosed, the audited financial results of the Company in the prescribed format for the quarter and
year ended March 31, 2023 under Ind AS, which were approved and taken on record by the Board of Directors
of the Company at their Meeting held today - May 18, 2023.
The Auditors' Report with an unmodified opinion on the said financial statement is also attached herewith.
Further, we are pleased to inform you that the Board of Directors has recommended a final dividend of 606%
at Rs. 60.60 per share for the financial year 2022-23, subject to tax, which shall be paid/dispatched on or after
the seventh day from the conclusion of the 34th Annual General Meeting, subject to the approval of the
shareholders of the Company.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended March 31, 2022.
data.news_body:
Please find enclosed, the audited financial results of the Company in the prescribed format for the quarter
and year ended March 31, 2022 under Ind AS, which were approved and taken on record by the Board of
Directors of the Company at their Meeting held today - April 20, 2022.
The Auditors' Report with an unmodified opinion on the said financial statement is also attached herewith.
Further, we are pleased to inform you that the Board of Directors has recommended, subject to the approval
of the members at the forthcoming Annual General Meeting, a final dividend of 425% at Rs. 42.50 per share
for the year 2021-22, subject to tax.
